this meme makes more sense balancing than the actual team does

i feel like i get why.

in his dance you see him flapping his wings like a bird. this means its something above him that over sees things maybe even god-like

then hes showing him being terrified of it then praying to it. i got it.

ritos keeping the game broken to please the EA gods
